QuestData.Title: "Thunder King" Pest Repellers
QuestData.Description: <An imposing image of a mogu face dominates this box, casting its gaze downward at neatly ordered rows of bold text.>$B$B"DO NOT LET WEAK, DISGUSTING INSECTS INFEST YOUR GLORIOUS CROPS. CONQUER THEM WITH THE MIGHT OF THE THUNDER KING AND PROTECT YOUR LEGACY."$B$B<The rest of the space is dedicated to cartoon depictions of various insects crying out in lament or fleeing in terror.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the "Thunder King" Pest Repellers to Farmer Yoon at Sunsong Ranch or Halfhill Market.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the "Thunder King" Pest Repellers to Farmer Yoon at Sunsong Ranch or Halfhill Market.
